events.message: I am filing a claim due to a recent car accident where my vehicle was hit by another driver at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial filing details and the description of the collision.
An agent has been assigned to handle your vehicle accident claim and will be your point of contact throughout the process.
We acknowledge receipt of your auto accident claim and appreciate you providing the necessary details promptly.
Please provide a copy of the police report, photos of the car damage, and the repair estimate for further investigation.
All requested documents including police report and photos of the damaged vehicle have been submitted for review.
Our adjusters have started the investigation into your car accident claim based on the submitted evidence and paperwork.
The investigation is now completed and findings indicate that the collision was caused by the other partyâ€™s negligence.
A settlement offer has been proposed covering the repair costs and additional compensation for your vehicle damage.
Thank you for responding to the settlement proposal. Your feedback indicates acceptance of the terms and appreciation for the prompt service.
Your auto accident claim has been formally approved and we are proceeding with issuing the payment to cover your damages.
The payment for the approved car repair claim has been issued to your designated account successfully.
Your auto accident claim has been officially closed as all settlements and payments have been processed and confirmed.
